                     throws ValidatorException,
                            IllegalArgumentException
        Function which adds a student to the repository
        Parameters:
        id - : Integer - id of the Homework
        description - : String - Homework's description
        recvWeek - : Integer - Homework's receiving week
        deadlineWeek - : String - Homework's deadline week
        currWeek - : String - Homework's current week
        Returns:
        null if the homework was saved, the given HomeWork otherwise
        Throws:

        IllegalArgumentException - - if the arguments are null
